Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People across social media platforms are buzzing with excitement about the upcoming budget being presented by the Australian government. Reputed to be in line with Labor's traditions of helping those in need creating more opportunities and investing in the future this year's budget promises a small surplus the first in 15 years along with various cost of living aids for Aussies. The anticipation is palpable and these posts are proof that everyone is eager to find out what the budget mentions and what tips it includes.
